attributes.additional_details:
The recent incidents occurring up and down the country, due to black Friday event have been shocking. Reports of people being trampled on, many injured and even a 9 year old boy punched in the face
By allowing this reckless practice we risk people being seriously injured or even killed.

I propose that stores keep Black Friday exclusively to online. This way customers still get the bargains they desire and the retailers get rid themselves of unwanted stock
